title: New: Frugal Father – Threat To Narrative
body:
Photo credit: Jamie OConnell Having [first cropped up](http://admin.

crackintheroad.com/music/20775-introducing-frugal-father/) on these very pages almost a year ago to the day, Colorado’s **Frugal Father** aka Mac Welch is back, with a debut EP expected later this year. Lead single _Threat To Narrative_ is another odd-pop masterpiece, fusing the sort of lo-fi aesthetic beloved of Casiotone For The Painfully Alone, with the broader, more expansive sound of LCD Soundsystem. Slightly introvert, and tongue in cheek at times: “but you bought all of my love / on a $10 card minimum”, it’s a unique, and thrilling sound, that Welch really makes his own.
